Transforming ideas into exceptional digital experiences

I'm Cody Roberts, a UI/UX designer with a passion for problem-solving through design.

Hi, I'm Cody

A UI/UX designer with a passion for problem-solving through design.

I am a visual specialist with an obsession for creative problem-solving. I have professional experience as a Photographer, a Graphic Designer and a 3D artist.

I have since discovered the world of UI UX design, and now have 3+ years of experience in delivering comprehensive design solutions from concept to production for web & mobile.

Specialising in visual design, I’m passionate about crafting engaging, intuitive digital experiences that connect with users.

EXPERIENCE

Lead UX / UI Designer • Digital Content Manager

UseVerb Australia • July 2021 - March 2024

  • Collaborated closely with Founders and Technical Project Managers to craft compelling digital experiences across Web and Mobile platforms, enhancing user engagement.
  • Led the development of key features, encompassing ideation, creation of user personas, UX flow design, wireframing, visual mock-ups, interactive prototypes, and comprehensive design specifications and guides for various development teams.
  • Fostered platform-wide consistency by developing comprehensive documentation and collaborating closely with development teams.
  • Optimised and managed the majority of static content across web and mobile platforms, enhancing SEO, accessibility and responsiveness.
  • Revamped the splash page, boosting user understanding and significantly increasing platform signups.
  • Worked closely with the sales team to create brand assets and print media, leading to a boost in brand trust and a 30% rise in engagement and sign-ups.
Graphic Designer

Curio Podcast Network Australia • April 2019

  • Collaborated closely with company founders to develop a comprehensive brand identity and establish a cohesive design system.
  • Crafted visual elements, setting design guidelines, and ensuring brand consistency.
  • Fostered platform-wide consistency by developing comprehensive documentation and collaborating closely with development teams.
  • Designed and crafted key digital assets: website UI/UX, podcast imagery, social media visuals, and ad materials, maintaining brand uniformity and enhancing user engagement.
Graphic Designer • UI Designer

Shizuoka Prefectural Tourism Association Japan • January 2018

  • Collaborated with a team to define the vision and strategy for a new website, aimed at boosting foreign tourism in the Shizuoka Prefecture in Japan, as part of a Japanese Government initiative.
  • Enhanced the brand's visual identity by creating a comprehensive design guide, aligning all branding elements across digital and print applications.
  • Designed and executed brand and advertising assets for both digital and print media, ensuring brand consistency and strategic alignment across all channels.
  • Worked closely with the web development team to enhance the website's layout and navigation, improving user experience and interface efficiency.
Freelance Interdisciplinary Designer

Self Employed Australia / Japan • March 2012 - present

  • Serving a multitude of clients on a wide range of projects, designing & creating a range of visual assets such as; logos, print advertising material, stage visuals, product visualisations, 3D renders, animations.
